sqlset.name: COMMUNITY_WEB
sqlset.sql-query: SELECT OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, ISSUE_ID, ISSUE_TYPE, ISSUE_STATUS, RESOLUTION, RESOLUTION_DATE, PRIORITY , COMPONENT, ASSIGNEE, REPOTER, SUMMARY, DESCRIPTION, DUE_DATE, TIMEORIGINALESTIMATE, TIMEESTIMATE, TIMESPENT, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM REP_ISSUE WHERE ISSUE_ID = ?

SELECT COUNT(ISSUE_ID) FROM REP_ISSUE WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?
<#if filter??><#list filter.filters as item ><#if item.field == "START_DATE"> ${item.logic} ( CREATION_DATE >= '${item.value}' OR DUE_DATE >= '${item.value}' ) <#elseif item.field == "END_DATE"> ${item.logic} ( ( DUE_DATE is null AND CREATION_DATE <= '${item.value}' ) OR ( DUE_DATE <= '${item.value}' ) ) <#else> ${item.logic} ${item.field}<#if item.operator == "eq" ><#if item.value??>=<#else> IS NULL</#if><#elseif item.operator == "contains" && item.value?? > LIKE '%${item.value}%'<#elseif item.operator == "neq"><#if item.value??>!=<#else> IS NOT NULL</#if><#elseif item.operator == "gte">>=<#elseif item.operator == 'lte'><=</#if><#if item.value?? && item.operator != "contains" >'${item.value}'</#if> </#if></#list></#if>

SELECT ISSUE_ID FROM REP_ISSUE WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?
<#if filter??><#list filter.filters as item ><#if item.field == "START_DATE"> ${item.logic} ( CREATION_DATE >= '${item.value}' OR DUE_DATE >= '${item.value}' ) <#elseif item.field == "END_DATE"> ${item.logic} ( ( DUE_DATE is null AND CREATION_DATE <= '${item.value}' ) OR ( DUE_DATE <= '${item.value}' ) ) <#else> ${item.logic} ${item.field}<#if item.operator == "eq" ><#if item.value??>=<#else> IS NULL</#if><#elseif item.operator == "contains" && item.value?? > LIKE '%${item.value}%'<#elseif item.operator == "neq"><#if item.value??>!=<#else> IS NOT NULL</#if><#elseif item.operator == "gte">>=<#elseif item.operator == 'lte'><=</#if><#if item.value?? && item.operator != "contains" >'${item.value}'</#if> </#if></#list></#if> <#if sort?? && ( sort?size > 0 ) > ORDER BY <#list sort as item > ${item.field} ${item.dir} </#list><#else> ORDER BY MODIFIED_DATE DESC </#if>

INSERT INTO REP_ISSUE ( ISSUE_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, ISSUE_TYPE, ISSUE_STATUS, COMPONENT, SUMMARY, DESCRIPTION, PRIORITY, RESOLUTION, RESOLUTION_DATE, ASSIGNEE, REPOTER, DUE_DATE, TIMEORIGINALESTIMATE, TIMEESTIMATE, TIMESPENT, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)

UPDATE REP_ISSUE SET ISSUE_TYPE = ?, ISSUE_STATUS = ?, RESOLUTION = ?, RESOLUTION_DATE = ?, PRIORITY = ?, COMPONENT = ?, SUMMARY = ?, DESCRIPTION = ?, ASSIGNEE = ?, REPOTER = ?, DUE_DATE = ?, TIMEESTIMATE = ?, TIMESPENT = ?, MODIFIED_DATE = ? WHERE ISSUE_ID = ?

SELECT count( T1.ISSUE_ID ) FROM REP_ISSUE T1 , REP_PROJECT T2 WHERE T1.OBJECT_TYPE = 19 AND T1.OBJECT_ID = T2.PROJECT_ID
<#if data.TILL_THIS_WEEK??> AND ( to_char( T1.DUE_DATE, 'yyyyMMdd') <= '${data.TILL_THIS_WEEK}' or ( T1.DUE_DATE is null AND to_char( T1.CREATION_DATE, 'yyyyMMdd') <= '${data.TILL_THIS_WEEK}' ) )</#if> <#if filter??><#list filter.filters as item > <#if item.filters?has_content > ${item.logic} ( <#list item.filters as item_item ><#if item_item.logic??>${item_item.logic}</#if> ${item_item.field} <#if item_item.operator == "eq" ><#if item_item.value??>=<#else>IS NULL</#if><#elseif item_item.operator == "neq"><#if item_item.value??>!=<#else>IS NOT NULL</#if><#elseif item_item.operator == "gte">>=<#elseif item_item.operator == 'lte'><=</#if><#if item_item.value?? >'${item_item.value}'</#if></#list> ) <#else> <#if item.field == "assigneeType"><#if item.value == "1" >${item.logic} T1.ASSIGNEE = ${user.userId} <#elseif item.value == "2" >${item.logic} T1.ASSIGNEE != ${user.userId} <#elseif item.value == "3" >${item.logic} T1.ASSIGNEE is null </#if> <#else>${item.logic} ${item.field}<#if item.operator == "eq" >=<#elseif item.operator == "neq">!=<#elseif item.operator == "gte">>=<#elseif item.operator == 'lte'><=</#if>'${item.value}'</#if> </#if> </#list></#if>

SELECT T2.PROJECT_ID, T2.CONTRACTOR AS PROJECT_CONTRACTOR , T2.CONTRACT_STATE AS PROJECT_CONTRACT_STATE, T2.NAME AS PROJECT_NAME , T1.ISSUE_ID, T1.SUMMARY AS ISSUE_SUMMARY, T1.ISSUE_TYPE, T1.PRIORITY AS ISSUE_PRIORITY, T1.RESOLUTION AS ISSUE_RESOLUTION, T1.ISSUE_STATUS, T1.REPOTER, T1.ASSIGNEE, T1.DUE_DATE, T1.RESOLUTION_DATE, T1.CREATION_DATE, T1.MODIFIED_DATE FROM REP_ISSUE T1 , REP_PROJECT T2 WHERE T1.OBJECT_TYPE = 19 AND T1.OBJECT_ID = T2.PROJECT_ID
<#if data.TILL_THIS_WEEK??>AND ( to_char( T1.DUE_DATE, 'yyyyMMdd') <= '${data.TILL_THIS_WEEK}' or ( T1.DUE_DATE is null AND to_char( T1.CREATION_DATE, 'yyyyMMdd') <= '${data.TILL_THIS_WEEK}' ) )</#if> <#if filter??><#list filter.filters as item > <#if item.filters?has_content > ${item.logic} ( <#list item.filters as item_item ><#if item_item.logic??>${item_item.logic}</#if> ${item_item.field} <#if item_item.operator == "eq" ><#if item_item.value??>=<#else>IS NULL</#if><#elseif item_item.operator == "neq"><#if item_item.value??>!=<#else>IS NOT NULL</#if><#elseif item_item.operator == "gte">>=<#elseif item_item.operator == 'lte'><=</#if><#if item_item.value?? >'${item_item.value}'</#if></#list> ) <#else> <#if item.field == "assigneeType"><#if item.value == "1" >${item.logic} T1.ASSIGNEE = ${user.userId} <#elseif item.value == "2" >${item.logic} T1.ASSIGNEE != ${user.userId} <#elseif item.value == "3" >${item.logic} T1.ASSIGNEE is null </#if> <#else>${item.logic} ${item.field}<#if item.operator == "eq" >=<#elseif item.operator == "neq">!=<#elseif item.operator == "gte">>=<#elseif item.operator == 'lte'><=</#if>'${item.value}'</#if> </#if> </#list></#if> ORDER BY T1.OBJECT_ID, T1.ISSUE_ID, T1.ISSUE_TYPE
SELECT PROJECT_ID, NAME, SUMMARY, CONTRACTOR, CONTRACT_STATE, MAINTENANCE_COST, START_DATE, END_DATE, PROJECT_ENABLED, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM REP_PROJECT WHERE PROJECT_ID = ?

INSERT INTO REP_PROJECT ( PROJECT_ID, NAME, SUMMARY, CONTRACTOR, CONTRACT_STATE, MAINTENANCE_COST, START_DATE, END_DATE, PROJECT_ENABLED, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ? ,?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
UPDATE REP_PROJECT SET NAME = ?, SUMMARY = ?, CONTRACTOR = ?, CONTRACT_STATE = ?, MAINTENANCE_COST = ?, START_DATE = ?, END_DATE = ?, PROJECT_ENABLED = ?, MODIFIED_DATE = ? WHERE PROJECT_ID = ?

SELECT PROJECT_ID FROM REP_PROJECT
<#compress> <#if filter?? && ( filter.filters?size > 0 ) > WHERE <#list filter.filters as item > <#if item.logic??>${item.logic}</#if> ${item.field} <#if item.value?? > <#if item.operator == "startswith" && item.value?? > LIKE '${item.value}%' <#elseif item.operator == "eq" > = '${item.value}' <#elseif item.operator == "neq"> != '${item.value}' <#elseif item.operator == "gte"> >= ${item.value} <#elseif item.operator == 'lte'> <= ${item.value}</#if> <#else> <#if item.operator == "eq" > IS NULL <#elseif item.operator == "neq"> IS NOT NULL </#if> </#if> </#list></#if> <#if sort?? && ( sort?size > 0 ) > ORDER BY <#list sort as item > ${item.field} ${item.dir} </#list><#else> ORDER BY MODIFIED_DATE DESC </#if> </#compress>

SELECT COUNT(PROJECT_ID) FROM REP_PROJECT
<#if filter?? && ( filter.filters?size > 0 ) > WHERE <#list filter.filters as item > <#if item.logic??>${item.logic}</#if> ${item.field} <#if item.value?? > <#if item.operator == "startswith" && item.value?? > LIKE '${item.value}%' <#elseif item.operator == "eq" > = '${item.value}' <#elseif item.operator == "neq"> != '${item.value}' <#elseif item.operator == "gte"> >= ${item.value} <#elseif item.operator == 'lte'> <= ${item.value}</#if> <#else> <#if item.operator == "eq" > IS NULL <#elseif item.operator == "neq"> IS NOT NULL </#if> </#if> </#list></#if>
SELECT ISSUE_TYPE , COUNT ( ISSUE_ID ) AS CNT FROM REP_ISSUE WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = 19 AND OBJECT_ID = ? GROUP BY ( ISSUE_TYPE )
SELECT RESOLUTION , COUNT ( ISSUE_ID ) AS CNT FROM REP_ISSUE WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = 19 AND OBJECT_ID = ? GROUP BY ( RESOLUTION )
SELECT CODESET_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, PARENT_CODESET_ID, NAME, GROUP_CODE, CODE, DESCRIPTION, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM REP_CODESET WHERE CODESET_ID = ?
INSERT INTO REP_CODESET ( CODESET_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, PARENT_CODESET_ID, NAME, GROUP_CODE, CODE, DESCRIPTION, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)
UPDATE REP_CODESET SET PARENT_CODESET_ID = ?, NAME = ?, GROUP_CODE = ?, CODE = ?, DESCRIPTION = ?, MODIFIED_DATE = ? WHERE CODESET_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(CODESET_ID) FROM REP_CODESET WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?
SELECT CODESET_ID FROM REP_CODESET WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ? ORDER BY CREATION_DATE, CODESET_ID ASC
SELECT COUNT(CODESET_ID) FROM REP_CODESET WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ? AND CODESET_ID =? AND PARENT_CODESET_ID = ?
SELECT CODESET_ID FROM REP_CODESET WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ? AND PARENT_CODESET_ID = ? ORDER BY CREATION_DATE, NAME ASC
SELECT COUNT(CODESET_ID) FROM REP_CODESET WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ? AND CODESET_ID =? AND PARENT_CODESET_ID > 0 AND GROUP_CODE = ?
SELECT CODESET_ID FROM REP_CODESET WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ? AND PARENT_CODESET_ID > 0 AND GROUP_CODE = ? ORDER BY CREATION_DATE, NAME ASC
SELECT COUNT(CODESET_ID) FROM REP_CODESET WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ? AND CODESET_ID =? AND PARENT_CODESET_ID > 0 AND GROUP_CODE = ? AND CODE = ?
SELECT CODESET_ID FROM REP_CODESET WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ? AND PARENT_CODESET_ID > 0 AND GROUP_CODE = ? AND CODE = ? ORDER BY CREATION_DATE, NAME ASC
SELECT CODESET_ID, CREATION_DATE FROM REP_CODESET WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ? AND PARENT_CODESET_ID IS NULL ORDER BY CREATION_DATE ASC
SELECT CODESET_ID, PARENT_COMMENT_ID FROM REP_CODESET WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ? AND PARENT_CODESET_ID IS NOT NULL ORDER BY CREATION_DATE, CODESET_ID ASC
SELECT CODESET_ID FROM REP_CODESET WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ? AND GROUP_CODE = ? AND CODE = ?
SELECT VIEWCOUNT FROM REP_VIEWCOUNT WHERE ENTITY_TYPE = ? AND ENTITY_ID = ?
DELETE FROM REP_VIEWCOUNT WHERE ENTITY_TYPE = ? AND ENTITY_ID = ?
UPDATE REP_VIEWCOUNT SET VIEWCOUNT = ? WHERE ENTITY_TYPE = ? AND ENTITY_ID = ?
INSERT INTO REP_VIEWCOUNT ( ENTITY_TYPE, ENTITY_ID, VIEWCOUNT ) VALUES (?, ?, ?)

SELECT COMMENT_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, PARENT_COMMENT_ID, PARENT_OBJECT_TYPE, PARENT_OBJECT_ID, USER_ID, NAME, EMAIL, URL, IP, BODY, STATUS, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM REP_COMMENT WHERE COMMENT_ID = ?

SELECT COMMENT_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, PARENT_COMMENT_ID, PARENT_OBJECT_TYPE, PARENT_OBJECT_ID, USER_ID, NAME, EMAIL, URL, IP, BODY, STATUS, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM REP_COMMENT WHERE USER_ID = ?

SELECT COMMENT_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, PARENT_COMMENT_ID, PARENT_OBJECT_TYPE, PARENT_OBJECT_ID, USER_ID, NAME, EMAIL, URL, IP, BODY, STATUS, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM REP_COMMENT WHERE MODIFIED_DATE >= ?

INSERT INTO REP_COMMENT ( COMMENT_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, PARENT_COMMENT_ID, PARENT_OBJECT_TYPE, PARENT_OBJECT_ID, USER_ID, NAME, EMAIL, URL, IP, BODY, STATUS, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?, ?,?,?,?,?, ?,?,?,?,?)
UPDATE REP_COMMENT SET PARENT_COMMENT_ID = ?, NAME = ?, EMAIL = ?, URL = ?, IP = ?, BODY = ?, STATUS = ?, MODIFIED_DATE = ? WHERE COMMENT_ID = ?
DELETE FROM REP_COMMENT WHERE COMMENT_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(COMMENT_ID) FROM REP_COMMENT WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?
SELECT COMMENT_ID, CREATION_DATE FROM REP_COMMENT WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ? AND ( PARENT_COMMENT_ID IS NULL OR PARENT_COMMENT_ID = -1 ) ORDER BY CREATION_DATE ASC
SELECT COMMENT_ID, PARENT_COMMENT_ID FROM REP_COMMENT WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ? AND PARENT_COMMENT_ID IS NOT NULL AND PARENT_COMMENT_ID > 0 ORDER BY CREATION_DATE, COMMENT_ID ASC
DELETE FROM REP_AVATAR_IMAGE WHERE AVATAR_IMAGE_ID = ?
DELETE FROM REP_AVATAR_IMAGE_DATA WHERE AVATAR_IMAGE_ID = ?
INSERT INTO REP_AVATAR_IMAGE ( AVATAR_IMAGE_ID, USER_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CONTENT_TYPE, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?,?,?,?,?,?,? )
INSERT INTO REP_AVATAR_IMAGE_DATA (AVATAR_IMAGE_ID, AVATAR_IMAGE_DATA) VALUES (?, EMPTY_BLOB())
INSERT REP_AVATAR_IMAGE_DATA (AVATAR_IMAGE_ID, AVATAR_IMAGE_DATA) VALUES (?, ?)
UPDATE REP_AVATAR_IMAGE_DATA SET AVATAR_IMAGE_DATA = ? WHERE AVATAR_IMAGE_ID = ?
SELECT AVATAR_IMAGE_ID FROM REP_AVATAR_IMAGE WHERE PRIMARY_IMAGE = 1 AND USER_ID = ?
SELECT AVATAR_IMAGE_ID, USER_ID, PRIMARY_IMAGE, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CONTENT_TYPE, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM REP_AVATAR_IMAGE WHERE AVATAR_IMAGE_ID = ?
SELECT AVATAR_IMAGE_ID FROM REP_AVATAR_IMAGE WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(AVATAR_IMAGE_ID) FROM REP_AVATAR_IMAGE WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT AVATAR_IMAGE_DATA FROM REP_AVATAR_IMAGE_DATA WHERE AVATAR_IMAGE_ID = ?
UPDATE REP_AVATAR_IMAGE SET PRIMARY_IMAGE = 0 WHERE USER_ID = ?
SELECT ATTACHMENT_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, CONTENT_TYPE, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, USER_ID, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM REP_ATTACHMENT
SELECT ATTACHMENT_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, CONTENT_TYPE, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, USER_ID, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM REP_ATTACHMENT WHERE ATTACHMENT_ID = ?

sql-query.name: SELECT_ATTACHMENT_BY_OBJECT_TYPE_AND_OBJECT_ID
sql-query.description: OBJECT_TYPE 와 OBJECT_ID 값으로 첨부파일 조회

sqlset.sql-query: SELECT ATTACHMENT_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, CONTENT_TYPE, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, USER_ID, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM REP_ATTACHMENT WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?
SELECT ATTACHMENT_ID, ATTACHMENT_DATA FROM REP_ATTACHMENT_DATA WHERE ATTACHMENT_ID = ?
INSERT INTO REP_ATTACHMENT ( ATTACHMENT_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, CONTENT_TYPE, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, USER_ID, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?, ? )
UPDATE REP_ATTACHMENT SET OBJECT_TYPE = ?, OBJECT_ID = ?, CONTENT_TYPE = ?, FILE_NAME = ?, FILE_SIZE = ?, CREATION_DATE = ?, MODIFIED_DATE = ? WHERE ATTACHMENT_ID = ?
DELETE FROM REP_ATTACHMENT WHERE ATTACHMENT_ID = ?
SELECT ATTACHMENT_ID FROM REP_ATTACHMENT_DATA
INSERT INTO REP_ATTACHMENT_DATA (ATTACHMENT_ID, ATTACHMENT_DATA) VALUES (?, EMPTY_BLOB())
UPDATE REP_ATTACHMENT_DATA SET ATTACHMENT_DATA = ? WHERE ATTACHMENT_ID = ?
INSERT REP_ATTACHMENT_DATA (ATTACHMENT_ID, ATTACHMENT_DATA) VALUES (?, ?)
SELECT ATTACHMENT_DATA FROM REP_ATTACHMENT_DATA WHERE ATTACHMENT_ID = ?
DELETE FROM REP_ATTACHMENT_DATA WHERE ATTACHMENT_ID = ?
DELETE FROM REP_ATTACHMENT_DATA
SELECT ATTACHMENT_ID FROM REP_ATTACHMENT WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(ATTACHMENT_ID) FROM REP_ATTACHMENT WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?

sql-query.name: USAGE_ATTACHMENT_BY_OBJECT_TYPE_AND_OBJECT_ID
sql-query.description: OBJECT_TYPE 와 OBJECT_ID 해당 이미지 크기 조회

sqlset.sql-query: SELECT SUM(FILE_SIZE) FROM REP_ATTACHMENT WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?
SELECT LINK_ID, IMAGE_ID, PUBLIC_SHARED FROM REP_IMAGE_LINK WHERE LINK_ID = ?
SELECT LINK_ID, IMAGE_ID, PUBLIC_SHARED FROM REP_IMAGE_LINK WHERE IMAGE_ID = ?
INSERT INTO REP_IMAGE_LINK ( LINK_ID, IMAGE_ID, PUBLIC_SHARED ) VALUES ( ?, ? ,? )
DELETE FROM REP_IMAGE_LINK WHERE LINK_ID = ?
DELETE FROM REP_IMAGE_LINK WHERE IMAGE_ID = ?
INSERT INTO REP_IMAGE ( IMAGE_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CONTENT_TYPE, USER_ID, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?, ? ,?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? , ?)
UPDATE REP_IMAGE SET OBJECT_TYPE = ?, OBJECT_ID = ?, FILE_NAME = ?, FILE_SIZE = ?, CONTENT_TYPE = ?, MODIFIED_DATE = ? WHERE IMAGE_ID = ?
SELECT IMAGE_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CONTENT_TYPE, USER_ID, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM REP_IMAGE WHERE IMAGE_ID = ?
DELETE FROM REP_IMAGE WHERE IMAGE_ID = ?
INSERT INTO REP_IMAGE_DATA (IMAGE_ID, IMAGE_DATA) VALUES (?, EMPTY_BLOB())
UPDATE REP_IMAGE_DATA SET IMAGE_DATA = ? WHERE IMAGE_ID = ?
INSERT REP_IMAGE_DATA (IMAGE_ID, IMAGE_DATA) VALUES (?, ?)
SELECT IMAGE_DATA FROM REP_IMAGE_DATA WHERE IMAGE_ID = ?
DELETE FROM REP_IMAGE_DATA WHERE IMAGE_ID = ?

sql-query.name: SELECT_IMAGE_BY_OBJECT_TYPE_AND_OBJECT_ID
sql-query.description: OBJECT_TYPE 와 OBJECT_ID 값으로 이미지 조회

sqlset.sql-query: SELECT IMAGE_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CONTENT_TYPE, USER_ID, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM REP_IMAGE WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?

sql-query.name: SELECT_IMAGE_IDS_BY_OBJECT_TYPE_AND_OBJECT_ID
sql-query.description: OBJECT_TYPE 와 OBJECT_ID 값으로 이미지 아이디 조회

sqlset.sql-query: SELECT IMAGE_ID FROM REP_IMAGE WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ? order by MODIFIED_DATE desc

sql-query.name: COUNT_IMAGE_BY_OBJECT_TYPE_AND_OBJECT_ID
sql-query.description: OBJECT_TYPE 와 OBJECT_ID 해당 이미지 수 조회

sqlset.sql-query: SELECT COUNT(IMAGE_ID) FROM REP_IMAGE WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?

sql-query.name: USAGE_IMAGE_BY_OBJECT_TYPE_AND_OBJECT_ID
sql-query.description: OBJECT_TYPE 와 OBJECT_ID 해당 이미지 크기 조회

sqlset.sql-query: SELECT SUM(FILE_SIZE) FROM REP_IMAGE WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?
UPDATE REP_LOGO SET PRIMARY_IMAGE = 0 WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?
INSERT INTO REP_LOGO ( LOGO_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, PRIMARY_IMAGE, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CONTENT_TYPE, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE ) VALUES ( ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ? )
UPDATE REP_LOGO SET OBJECT_TYPE = ?, OBJECT_ID = ?, PRIMARY_IMAGE = ?, FILE_NAME = ?, FILE_SIZE = ?, CONTENT_TYPE = ?, MODIFIED_DATE = ? WHERE LOGO_ID = ?
DELETE FROM REP_LOGO_DATA WHERE LOGO_ID = ?
INSERT INTO REP_LOGO_DATA (LOGO_ID, LOGO_DATA) VALUES (?, EMPTY_BLOB())
UPDATE REP_LOGO_DATA SET LOGO_DATA = ? WHERE LOGO_ID = ?
INSERT INTO REP_LOGO_DATA ( LOGO_ID, LOGO_DATA ) VALUES (?, ?)
DELETE FROM REP_LOGO WHERE LOGO_ID = ?
SELECT LOGO_DATA FROM REP_LOGO_DATA WHERE LOGO_ID = ?
SELECT LOGO_ID FROM REP_LOGO WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ? AND PRIMARY_IMAGE = 1
SELECT LOGO_ID, OBJECT_TYPE, OBJECT_ID, PRIMARY_IMAGE, FILE_NAME, FILE_SIZE, CONTENT_TYPE, CREATION_DATE, MODIFIED_DATE FROM REP_LOGO WHERE LOGO_ID = ?
SELECT LOGO_ID FROM REP_LOGO WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?
SELECT COUNT(LOGO_ID) FROM REP_LOGO WHERE OBJECT_TYPE = ? AND OBJECT_ID = ?
